Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I estimate its value to be well above $8000. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am proposing an exclusive offer of $12000. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also includes a comprehensive setup service and a one-year warranty. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit you and potentially revolutionize your workflow or project outcomes. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
